sentences.en: Britain's two main auction houses, Sotheby's and Christies, have been involved in valuing the works.
sentences.cn: 英国最大的两家拍卖行，苏富比和佳士得参与了对这些作品的估价。

sentences.en: Eight drawings by French artist Jean Cocteau will be auctioned next week.
sentences.cn: 法国艺术家让·科克托的8幅画作将在下周拍卖。
吉恩在拍卖会上作文书工作。

sentences.en: If you can buy only one case at auction, it should be vintage port.
sentences.cn: 如果你在拍卖会上只能买一样东西，那就应该是上等的波尔图葡萄酒。

sentences.en: Lord Salisbury bought the picture at auction in London some years ago.
sentences.cn: 几年前，索尔兹伯里勋爵在伦敦拍得了这幅画。

sentences.en: Many of the cars you will see at auction are repossessions.
sentences.cn: 你将在拍卖会上见到的许多车辆都是被收回物品。

sentences.en: The airline plans to auction its international routes to former competitors.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司打算把他们的国际线路拍卖给以前的竞争对手。

sentences.en: The painting is expected to fetch up to $400,000 at auction.
sentences.cn: 这幅画预计在拍卖会上能卖到40万美元。

sentences.en: The sale is a big coup for the auction house.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易是该拍卖行的一大成功之举。

sentences.en: They bought a new minibus with the proceeds from the auction.
sentences.cn: 他们用拍卖得来的钱买了一辆新面包车.

sentences.en: They've put the contents of their house up for auction.
sentences.cn: 他们把房子里的东西全都拿去拍卖了.

sentences.en: Thirteen per cent of Christie's coin and banknote auction went unsold.
sentences.cn: 佳士得13%的硬币和纸币拍卖流拍。

sentences.en: Trading was very light ahead of yesterday's auction.
sentences.cn: 昨天拍卖之前的成交量很小。

sentences.en: Watch this space for notice of our next auction.
sentences.cn: 请在这地方看我们下次拍卖的预告.

sentences.en: We bought these items at an auction.
sentences.cn: 这些物件是我们在一次拍卖时买的.
我们将为它们举办慈善拍卖。

phrases.tran_cn: 荷兰式拍卖；喊价逐步减低的拍卖
见 block 条 on the block

trans.tran_en: a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
to sell something at an auction
